channel.title: The complete list of tech terms starting with the letter 'N' on Tech Terminologies
channel.description: Recent content in The complete list of tech terms starting with the letter 'N' on Tech Terminologies

item.title: What is NoSQL Database?
item.description: NoSQL, also known as “Not Only SQL,” is a type of database that is designed to handle large volumes of structured, semi-structured, or unstructured data.

item.title: What is NBA (Network Behavior Analysis)?
item.description: Network behavior analysis is a cybersecurity technique that involves the continuous monitoring and analysis of network traffic and activity to identify unusual or malicious behavior.

item.title: What is NFC (Near Field Communication)?
item.description: Near Field Communication (NFC) is a short-range wireless technology that allows for the exchange of data or power between devices.

item.title: What is Network Topology?
item.description: Network topology refers to the layout or structure of a network.

item.title: What is a Network Adapter?
item.description: A network adapter, also known as a network interface card (NIC), is a hardware component that allows a computer to connect to a network.
